data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Kiboga, Uganda humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kiboga, Uganda

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Kiboga, Uganda a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Kiboga, Uganda.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Kiboga a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Kiboga, Uganda to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Hindi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Hindi people.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Kiboga, Uganda to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Kiboga, Uganda. Please, stir the 4,840 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Kiboga, Uganda. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

location.name: Kiboga
location.people_groups_list: Mvuba, Kalenjin, Pokot, Plains Bira, Arab, Lebanese, Chinese, general
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mvuba (1,200), Kalenjin, Pokot (134,000), Plains Bira (2,000), Arab, Lebanese (15,000), Chinese, general (19,000)
